amendment.description: Amendment adds a requirement that proposed regulations that duplicate or overlap with other existing regulations must be disclosed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-744 to add a requirement that proposed regulations that duplicate or overlap with other existing regulations must be disclosed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Fleming.
